name: The adventures of blue shirt guy
name_original: The adventures of blue shirt guy
description:
Your car blew up OH NO how sad looks like you'll you have to be walking and going on a big adventure.

HOW TO PLAY: 

Use A + D to move 

Press S to crouch or(fast fall)

And press space to jump

Avoid spikes and bunnies (the bunnies are not friendly they have rabies)

GUN CONTROLS:

Move your mouse to aim

Press left-click to shoot

IT'S FINALLY HERE!!! I have been working on this project for quite some time now, it took me more than my summer to finish it, BUT HERE IT IS The adventures of blue shirt guy.
